attributes.title: Ruining a community
attributes.review: He’s not only a bad president but he planes in removing a app because of the country it’s from, tiktok is a job for some ppl and creates opportunities for others so if you’re gonna ban it cause it’s a Chinese app ban iPhones and everything else China makes to

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Not only did it take AGES to download but it got a hacker in to my cellular device. Music starts playing out of no where. My phone glitches all of the time since I downloaded it . I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP. STAY AWAY FROM IT. This app will mess up your phone. STAY AWAY!!

attributes.title: This app is a joke 🤡
attributes.review: Never have I seen something so un useful, it took so much space on my phone I had to delete half of my photos and on the top of tht it made my phone glitch when I opened it

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: This app is the worst! Do NOT download!! It made my phone glitch so bad! It hacked everything! All my social medias. Second of all the app it’s self is bad! It took FOREVER to download. The software is so messed up! But this app is so stupid come on now.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: It took at least 10 days to fully download also it gave me a stroke just seeing this biG DISGUSTING ORANGE thing pop up on my screen in fact my whole family had a stroke even my dog this is seriously dangerous and so mf racist it should be illegal I SAID WHAT SHOULD BE SAID

attributes.title: I want my house back
attributes.review: While downloading this app my phone burst into flames and quickly became a house fire I was the only one to make it out alive I’m writing this review on a pay phone, but hear me out do not download this app😡😡😡😡🥵🥵😡😡

attributes.title: WORSE APP EVER!
attributes.review: It took 5days to download😾 and finally when you get to open the app it takes you out ABD THE WORSE PART is that when my child open it HE GOT A HARD ATTACK because he said he saw like a weird type of orange and a clown and he got really scare SO THIS APP SHOULD BE DELETE😡🤬😤😾😢😱😨😰😰👿

attributes.title: It made my whole phone glitch
attributes.review: When I downloaded it the app did not open, took hours to download, and when it did the touch screen did not work

attributes.title: Complications🍄🥰✨🧚‍♀️🌸
attributes.review: There are so many complications with this app, it's so confusing to work around and I can't even open it because the app icon is just horribly done. There is numerous reasons as to why this app deserves one star🛑
